[Desc]               <blue>Mike Thebes is a very tall man of about twenty years, while rather slender he has the ropey build of an athlete and stunning good looks. He has a confident smile on his face and regards the audience with a warm, welcoming look that for some reason is driving you up the wall, possibly because the host has barely said two words to you since Mike stepped on stage. With close crossed blond hair and a fraternity jacket hanging open you're not sure if he's someone you want to punch or befriend. You'll have to settle for transform. </blue>;

[tf]               Mike's hair double's in length and then doubles again, falling down in waves over his $FACE$. He swears in surprise then just lets loose a laugh in his $VOICE$ and tucks it behind his ears with his $HANDS$. "Looks like I'm going to need a haircut after this,” he observes. ;
[status]               Mike has long black hair tucked behind his ears, it's looking rather girly. ;
[short]               long black hair;
[tgShade]            hair 50;
[STAGE] 3;
[tf]               It's like watching a ghostly barber as Mike's hair is bundled up into tight dreadlocks that stick out from his head in all directions and Mike frowns at himself in the mirror. "Okay, I'm getting this shit lopped off as soon as we're done,” he says, then a predatory grin spreads across his $FACE$. "Well, when you're done at least.” ;
[status]               Mike has long black hair bundled into dreadlocks that stick out from his head at all angles.;
[short]               black dreadlocks;
[tgShade]            hair 75;
[STAGE] 4;
[tf]               Mike's hair grows again, eliciting a growl of annoyance from him. It spreads down his back in a wave of black dreadlocks and doesn't stop until it almost reaches his $BUTT$. He shakes his head, using his $HANDS$ to fluff the mass of hair and there's a rattling as the little bones knotted into the mass rattle. you're not sure if that makes him look sexy or terrifying. Possibly both. ;
[status]               A wave a dreadlocks hang down to the small of Mike's back laced with small bones, they might have once belonged to a human.;

[tf]               Mike's jacket seems to evaporate into the air, he tries to grab it with his $HANDS$ but it slips between his fingers and into the ether. "Damn it, I knew I should have left that in the locker room.” He's left wearing just a plain shirt that shows off his $BREASTS$.;

[STAGE] 2;
[tf]               Mike swears as his t-shirt shrinks down, within moments he's left with just a skimpy tank-top stretched tight across his $BODY$. The neckline is cut scandalously low and there's no sign of a bra, it looks like a deep breath will set his $BREASTS$ free and he crosses his $ARMS$ across his chest in a vain attempt to keep them constrained. ;
